pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, November 13, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Singapore

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Singapore.

Note for media:

    • Official photographers only

5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Canadian Chamber of Commerce and Canada-ASEAN Business Council.

Windows West Room, 20th Floor
Four Seasons Hotel Singapore
190 Orchard Boulevard

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

6:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with President of Temasek Song Hwee Chia.   

Windows West Room, 20th Floor
Four Seasons Hotel Singapore
190 Orchard Boulevard

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

6:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with President and Chief Executive Officer of ST Engineering Vincent Chong.  

Windows West Room, 20th Floor
Four Seasons Hotel Singapore
190 Orchard Boulevard

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a reception hosted by the High Commissioner of Canada to the Republic of Singapore Lynn McDonald.

Closed to media.
